definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bend down, stoop, crouch (intrans.) (cf. perh. Ar. qurs.un disc, round cake; cp. NH [[קַרְסוֹל]], [[קַרְחוֹל]], Targum [[קַרְסוּלָּא]], [[קַרְחוּלָא]] all ankle);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[קָֽרְסוּ]] Is 46:2; Pt. [[קׂרֵס]] v:Is 46:1 (both + [[כָּרַע]]); of vanquished gods of Babylon.
